metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16793 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The wav_convert2mono function in lib/wav.c in SWFTools 0.9.2 does notproperly validate WAV data, which allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (incorrect malloc and heap-based buffer overflow) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
